title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
**AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - 4000 Peak Current, 27800mAh Battery**

**Powerful and Reliable Jump Starting**
Experience the security of having a powerful jump starter for any emergency with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. This robust device boasts a peak current of 4000A, capable of jump-starting all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L. It's perfect for a wide range of vehicles including 12V cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.

**High-Capacity Battery**
Equipped with a high-capacity 27800mAh (88Wh) battery, this jump starter can provide up to 40 starts on a full charge. This makes it an indispensable tool for long trips, cold mornings, or as a reliable backup.

**Fast Charging Technology**
Charge your devices on the go with the built-in USB quick charge 3.0 and type-C input/output ports. The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter charges up to 75% faster than ordinary power banks, ensuring your gadgets are ready when you need them.

**Multiple Charging Ports**
- USB Port 1: 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A for adaptable fast charging.
- USB Port 2: 5V/2.4A for efficient device charging.

**Advanced Safety Features**
Drive with confidence knowing you're protected by intelligent protection systems, including short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection safeguards.

**LED Light Modes for Emergencies**
Equipped with a powerful LED light that has three modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe, you can ensure visibility in dark situations or signal for help in emergencies.

**Portable and Rugged Design**
Designed to be taken on the road, this jump starter is not only portable but also features a rugged design with metal clamps for durability and reliability.

**Everything You Need in One Package**
Your purchase includes:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case for easy storage and transportation
- User Manual to guide you through the features and usage

**24-Hour Online After-Sales Support**
We stand by our product with round-the-clock online after-sales support to assist with any questions or issues.

**Please Note**: An adapter is not included in the package.

Be prepared for any situation and get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today! Keep your vehicle running and your devices charged, no matter where your adventures take you.

**AVAPOW 4000A Car Jump Starter – Portable Power for All Your Vehicles**

Never get stranded with a dead battery again with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, your reliable roadside companion! Designed to jump-start your vehicle with ease, this powerhouse is a must-have in any car emergency kit.

**Key Features:**
- **Peak Current of 4000A:** Instantly jump-start any 12V vehicle up to 40 times on a full charge, including cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.
- **Universal Engine Compatibility:** Works with all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10 liters.
- **Massive Battery Capacity:** Equipped with a 27800mAh (88Wh) battery, ensuring you have ample power when you need it most.
- **Intelligent Protection Systems:** Complete with safeguards against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections for safe and worry-free use.
- **Rapid Charging Speed:** Charges 75% faster than standard power banks, getting you back on the road in no time.
- **Multi-Function LED Light:** Features a built-in LED light with flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes for emergencies or nighttime operations.
- **Versatile Charging Ports:** Includes a Type-C input/output port and two USB ports (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A and 5V/2.4A) for quick charging of your devices on the go.
- **Rugged and Portable Design:** Durable and easy to carry, this jump starter is designed for adventure and everyday use alike.
- **Comprehensive Accessory Kit:** Comes with everything you need - Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and a User Manual.

**Package Contents:**
- 1x AVAPOW Portable Battery Starter
- 1x Set of Jumper Cables
- 1x USB-C Cable
- 1x Cigarette Lighter Converter
- 1x Durable Carry Case
- 1x User Manual

**Customer Care:**
- Enjoy peace of mind with our 24-hour online after-sales support team, ready to assist you with any queries or issues.

**Note:** Adapter not included.

**Empower Your Travel with AVAPOW:** Whether you're on a family road trip, an off-road adventure, or simply commuting, our AVAPOW Car Jump Starter ensures you and your vehicles are powered up and protected. Add this essential tool to your gear today and experience the confidence of being prepared for any battery emergency on the road!

**Product Listing for AVAPOW Car Jump Starter**

---

**Title:** AVAPOW 4000A Peak 27800mAh Car Jump Starter – Portable Power Bank with LED Light & Intelligent Protection

**Bullet Points:**
- **Peak Performance:** Harness 4000A peak current to start your vehicle. Suitable for all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L.
- **High Capacity:** Equipped with a 27800mAh battery (88Wh), capable of delivering up to 40 jump starts on a full charge.
- **Versatile Use:** Designed for a wide range of vehicles, including 12V cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.
- **Quick Charge Technology:** Features USB Quick Charge 3.0 and dual USB charging ports (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A and 5V/2.4A) to power your devices 75% faster than standard power banks.
- **LED Light Modes:** Stay prepared with built-in LED light functions including flashlight, SOS, and strobe for emergencies or nighttime use.
- **Advanced Safety:** Integrated intelligent protection systems safeguard against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections.
- **Portable & Rugged:** This jump starter is designed to be portable, featuring a rugged build and metal clamps for durability and longevity.
- **Comprehensive Package:** Includes Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual.
- **After-Sales Support:** Benefit from a 24-hour online after-sales team ready to assist you with any inquiries or issues.

**Product Description:**
Never get stranded with a dead battery again! The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is a formidable ally in any vehicle emergency. With a peak current of 4000A and a high-capacity 27800mAh battery, you can effortlessly start your vehicle's engine, be it a hefty 10L diesel or any gasoline engine.

This robust jump box isn't just for emergencies; it doubles as a powerful power bank. Featuring USB Quick Charge 3.0 and versatile charging ports, you can charge your devices on the go, faster than ever before. Whether it's your smartphone, tablet, or other USB-powered gadgets, AVAPOW has you covered.

Designed for the adventurous and the practical alike, this jump starter is perfect for a variety of vehicles, including cars, motorcycles, and even your winter snowmobile. With LED light modes at your fingertips, you'll have the visibility you need, whenever you need it.

Safety is paramount with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter's intelligent protection systems, ensuring you and your vehicle are protected from potential electrical hazards. Its portable design and rugged construction mean you can take it anywhere with confidence.

The package comes complete with all the accessories you need to get started right away, and with the included carry case, keeping everything organized is a breeze. Although an adapter is not included, the versatile USB-C and other charging options ensure you'll always find a way to power up.

Trust in AVAPOW's 24-hour online after-sales team to support you whenever you need assistance. Invest in the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today for peace of mind on all your travels!

**Note:** Please ensure to read the User Manual carefully before use for optimal operation and safety guidelines.
